content: The ground truth BIRD region has been segmented with inaccurate boundaries, especially on the neck, where some BACKGROUND areas have been misclassified as BIRD.

The prediction mask is quite chaotic. The DOG region is incomplete and mixed with CHAIR and SOFA regions. The CHAIR region is over-extended towards the top and left. SOFA regions have been hallucinated all over the scene.

The ground truth AEROPLANE region has been segmented with somewhat coarser boundaries, especially on the right, where the prediction mask is incomplete. Also, the bottom of the AEROPLANE region is under-segmented.

The ground truth TVMONITOR region on the top has been segmented with inaccurate boundaries, especially on the top and right. Some TVMONITOR area has been over-extended towards the top and right and some have been under-segmented towards the center.
The ground truth TRAIN region on the right has been segmented with somewhat coarser and imperfect boundaries, some TRAIN area has been under-segmented towards the center.

The ground truth AEROPLANE region has been segmented with inaccurate boundaries, especially on the right wing and the tail of the plane in the background. The PERSON region on the bottom has been under-segmented.

The ground truth BOAT region on the right has been segmented with inaccurate boundaries, especially on the top. The BOAT region on the left has been over-extended towards the left. The top of the mast of the BOAT on the right is missing in the prediction.
The ground truth TRAIN region has been segmented with inaccurate boundaries, especially in the central area, where some BACKGROUND areas have been misclassified as TRAIN.
The ground truth AEROPLANE region has been segmented with inaccurate boundaries, especially on the left, and the AEROPLANE region is under-segmented.

The ground truth TVMONITOR region on the left has been segmented with somewhat coarser and imperfect boundaries, some TVMONITOR area has been over-extended towards the left. The TVMONITOR region on the right has been under-segmented and is incomplete.

The ground truth SHEEP region has been segmented with inaccurate boundaries, especially on the left and on the top-right, where some SHEEP area has been under-segmented and misclassified as BACKGROUND.

The ground truth BICYCLE region has been segmented with inaccurate boundaries, especially on the bottom, and the BACKGROUND areas that interact with the BICYCLE region have been completely missed and misclassified as BICYCLE.

The ground truth PERSON region has been segmented with inaccurate boundaries, especially on the top of the head, where the prediction is under-segmented. The hand holding the glass is also under-segmented, and some BACKGROUND areas have been misclassified as PERSON.

The ground truth BOAT regions have been segmented with inaccurate boundaries, especially the BOAT region in the center of the scene, which is over-segmented. The BOAT region on the left is under-segmented.
The ground truth PERSON regions have been segmented with somewhat coarser boundaries, especially on the right person's face, and these tend to be slightly over-extended.
The ground truth TRAIN region has been segmented with somewhat coarser boundaries, especially on the top-right, and these tend to be slightly over-extended.

The ground truth DININGTABLE region on the bottom has been segmented with somewhat coarser and imperfect boundaries, some DININGTABLE area has been under-segmented towards the top and some have been over-extended towards the left.

The ground truth BOTTLE region on the left has been segmented with inaccurate boundaries, and the BACKGROUND areas that interact with the BOTTLE region have been completely missed and misclassified as BOTTLE. The ground truth PERSON region on the right has been segmented with somewhat coarser boundaries.

The ground truth MOTORBIKE region on the left has been segmented with inaccurate boundaries, especially on the bottom, and the MOTORBIKE region on the right has been under-segmented. The PERSON region on the top right has been segmented with inaccurate boundaries.

The ground truth BIRD region has been segmented with inaccurate boundaries, especially on the right, where the feathers are not well defined. The BACKGROUND areas that interact with the BIRD region have been completely missed and misclassified as BIRD.
